section.title: Update product backlog , Add and Update product backlog item.
section.para: This page includes three part for updating product backlog, adding and updating new product backlog item.

section.title: Update Product Backlog
section.para: This part use to update product backlog or back to previous page.

listitem.para: Enter product backlog name that user need to update.
Select open and closed date time that user need to update for calculating work hours of product backlog.
Click update button when insert all above fields.
Click back button when user need to back to previous page.

section.title: Add New Product Backlog Item
section.para: This part use to add new product backlog item

listitem.para: Enter priority of this product backlog item.
Click submit button when insert all above fields.

section.title: Product Backlog Items List
section.para: This part use to display product backlog items

listitem.para: Click at product backlog item name when user need to update it and click back button to back to previous page.
Click delete button when user need to delete some product backlog items.
